recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package
2. Fry pancetta until crispy
3. Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl
4. Combine everything while hot
recipes.author: chef1

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop all vegetables
2. Heat oil in wok
3. Stir-fry veggies for 5 mins
4. Add sauce and cook 2 more mins
recipes.author: chef2
